title: Casemiro The Hero
description:
The FC crew react to Chelsea 1-1 draw with Manchester United and break down Casemiro's impressive game saving header for the Red Devils. Plus, the guys break down Liverpool's shocking 1-0 loss at Nottingham Forest and marvel at Erling Haaland's brilliance as the Norwegian scored another brace.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Casemiro saves Man United a point; Haaland at the double again; Real Madrid continue to unbeaten start to the season
